Comment: "Stone resigned from a post as a consultant to the [1996 presidential campaign](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1996_United_States_presidential_election) for Senator [Bob Dole](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Dole) after the [*National Enquirer*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Enquirer) reported that Stone had placed ads and pictures on websites and [swingers'](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swinging_(sexual_practice)) publications seeking sexual partners for himself and Nydia Bertran Stone, his second wife. Stone initially denied the report.[^(\[38\])](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Stone#cite_note-dswp827-40)[^(\[42\])](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Stone#cite_note-jhnyt-44) On the [*Good Morning America*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Good_Morning_America) program he falsely stated, "An exhaustive investigation now indicates that a domestic employee, who I discharged for substance abuse on the second time that we learned that he had a drug problem, is the perpetrator who had access to my home, access to my computer, access to my password, access to my postage meter, access to my post-office box key."[^(\[38\])](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Stone#cite_note-dswp827-40) In a 2008 interview with [*The New Yorker*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_New_Yorker), Stone admitted that the ads were authentic.[^(\[16\])](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Stone#cite_note-toobin-18)^("  From wiki.)   ^(BTW the ads were for a particular race with particular attributes.)   ^(Scumbag all the way.)

And magats going after people deemed as an enemy of Trump has already happened. Paul Pelosi, Pence, Gabby Giffords (Kelly's wife), the pipe bombs sent to prominent dems, threats on Fauci and his family to the point he needed security details, the same with judges Trump has called out and maga doxxed, the election workers Giuliani lied about. Even on a local level, I know a Democratic delegate who has been dealing with stalking, threats, etc. The FBI has had to alert her on multiple occasions of credible imminent threats.   Stone's comments now put an actual target on Kelly. This is a real threat to his life. Ignoring the utter irony and hypocrisy of both Stone and Trump being actual convicted criminals, Stone's words carry real weight among the deplorables.   Absurdity is most certainly already our reality.
